Topic.Title: MITT ROMNEY IS MORMON... vs. OBAMA IS CHRISTIAN, you choose...

Message.Msg: We are not voting today for the President of the USA Church. We vote for the person capacity and plans on making the USA the best country in the world in the greatest possible number of ways both domestically and internationally. What religion we are today or not today is not what counts, but, what religion you finally belong to at the twilight of life and upon approaching death. Our GOD gives us so many chances to discover the truth and repent and become born unto him and seek full free graces of ever lasting life.
